text.div:
This value set contains 3 concepts

EncounterLocationStatus

The status of the location

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/encounter-location-status

CodeDisplayDefinition
planned PlannedThe patient is planned to be moved to this location at some point in the future.
present PresentThe patient is currently at this location, or was between the period specified.
reserved ReservedThis location is held empty for this patient.

concept.definition: The patient is planned to be moved to this location at some point in the future.
The patient is currently at this location, or was between the period specified.
This location is held empty for this patient.
